annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 24000.

Maximilian Philipp (Freiburg) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Daniel Siebert blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
Florian Niederlechner (Freiburg) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Lukas Kubler is going off and Christian Streich gives the last tactical orders to Aleksandar Ignjovski (Freiburg).
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) latched on to a lofted pass inside the box, but his header misses to the right of the target.
Maximilian Philipp (Freiburg) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Daniel Siebert has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thomas Tuchel has decided to substitute Marco Reus and he is replaced by Christian Pulisic (Dortmund).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Pierre Emerick Aubameyang leaves the pitch and Andre Schurrle (Dortmund) comes on.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) wriggles into space and fires the ball from the edge of the area, but one of the defenders is there to block the effort.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager makes a subsitution with Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) coming on for Ousmane Dembele.
Lukasz Piszczek (Dortmund) gives away a foul during an attacking move and the referee blows his whistle.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) makes a strong challenge and Daniel Siebert blows for a foul.
Florian Niederlechner (Freiburg) unleashes a superb first time shot from the edge of the box, but it flies narrowly wide of the left post.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Erik Durm sprays a pass out to Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund), and he has an easy job to slot the ball into an empty net. The score is 0:3.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) amazingly found his way through the defence, but lacked a precise finish as his effort from close range went slightly wide of the right post.
Great ball in from Ousmane Dembele. Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) should really have done better with a close range header, but he heads it a whisker over the crossbar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Maximilian Philipp (Freiburg) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Daniel Siebert didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner kick from Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) is headed out of the penalty area by one of the defenders.

Florian Niederlechner (Freiburg) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Roman Burki. It will be a corner kick for SC Freiburg.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.
Florian Niederlechner (Freiburg) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger. SC Freiburg force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Christian Streich is forced to make a change. Nils Petersen is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by Florian Niederlechner (Freiburg).
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Daniel Siebert blows his whistle for a foul.
Nils Petersen (Freiburg) wins himself just enough space inside the box to connect with the corner. His header flies towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper blocks the effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.

A lofted cross from Nils Petersen (Freiburg) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area. The linesman makes the right call and SC Freiburg will have a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Marco Reus puts the ball across the area and Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) has the easiest task in the world to tuck the ball into an empty net. 0:2.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund), comes to nothing.

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety. The ball goes out of play. Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.
Nils Petersen (Freiburg) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Daniel Siebert blows his whistle for a foul.
A cross is clipped into the penalty area by Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) but poses no threat.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of today's match has just finished.

It's unbelievable, Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) blows a huge opportunity! He is totally unmarked and fires a first time shot towards goal from a few yards out, but Alexander Schwolow reacts superbly to keep the ball out.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is unable to feed a through ball into the path of his teammates.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence.
A cross from Marco Reus (Dortmund) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety. The ball is out of play and Dortmund manage to earn a corner.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) finds space on the edge of the box, but his wild shot goes high over the bar.
Nicolas Hofler (Freiburg) fails to find a teammate across the pitch with a long ball.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) has a huge chance to score from close range, but his effort goes just a few inches wide of the right hand post.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) creates a yard of space for himself and tries an effort from the edge of the box, but it goes just wide of the left post.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and Daniel Siebert blows for a foul.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Alexander Schwolow.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Onur Bulut walks off the pitch and Marc Oliver Kempf (Freiburg) comes on as a substitute.
Flag goes up against Christian Gunter (Freiburg) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.
Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) unleashes a sharp shot from the free kick that sails not far wide of the left post.
A clumsy foul by Julian Weigl (Dortmund) and Daniel Siebert blows his whistle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Erik Durm (Dortmund) unleashes a powerful shot towards goal, but it is bravely blocked by a self sacrificing defender. Dortmund will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! Raphael Guerreiro curls the free kick into the box. Sokratis (Dortmund) peels off his marker and arrows a brilliant header past Alexander Schwolow and into the right side of the net. 0:1.
Daniel Siebert blows his whistle and signals a foul after Caglar Soyuncu (Freiburg) brought his opponent down.
CHANCE! Marco Reus (Dortmund) goes very close! He gathers a cross inside the box and fires a shot towards Alexander Schwolow, who produces an excellent reflex save.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) is unlucky with a goal bound effort from the edge of the box. A fortuitous save from Alexander Schwolow stops the ball from going into the middle of the goal.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) is unable to feed an accurate cross into the box.
The linesman raises his flag. Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) is adjudged offside.
Daniel Siebert couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Erik Durm (Dortmund) and blew his whistle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.
Nils Petersen (Freiburg) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. SC Freiburg force a corner. They send men into the box.
